title: The Dragon's Fury: (The Dragon's Song Series Book Three) : A Romantic Fantasy Series
description: Forever, I PromiseCori and Rowan have escaped Cadmus and Daiyu only to find themselves pursued by their once friends. But instead of the fight they were expecting, the other Dijem offer a solution to finish the war that Cori and Rowan find difficult to refuse. Can Cori and Rowan take back the throne and defeat Cadmus once and for all? Or will this war and the revelations Cadmus has been hiding about Coriâ€™s magic be more than they can handle?
author: Emily L.K.
